title: Herd health coordination
text: Herd health coordination. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We start work before sunrise during harvest. We design protocols for herd health management. We record yields and monitor feed intake. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy.
